message.content:
Breakfast:
- Scrambled tofu with spinach and tomatoes, seasoned with salt, pepper, and turmeric. Serve with gluten-free toast or a side of fruit.

Lunch:
- Quinoa salad with mixed vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, cucumber), chickpeas, and a lemon-olive oil dressing. Garnish with fresh herbs like parsley and basil.

Dinner:
- Baked chicken breast with sweet potato fries and steamed broccoli. Drizzle the chicken with a little lemon juice and fresh herbs. Serve the sweet potato fries with a dairy-free yogurt dip or ketchup.

Snacks:
- A piece of fresh fruit, such as an apple or pear.
- A handful of sunflower seeds or pumpkin seeds for a healthy crunch and some added protein.

Remember to stay hydrated throughout the day by drinking plenty of water. This meal plan will provide you with a variety of nutrients, including protein, carbohydrates, and healthy fats, while avoiding your allergens. Enjoy!
